name: Sir Leslie Marr
introduction: Sir Leslie Lynn Marr of Sunderland, 2nd Baronet (born 14 August 1922 and died 4 May 2021) was a British artist and Formula One driver. He participated in 22 non-championship races in a privateer Connaught between 1952 and 1955. He also participated in the 1954 and 1955 British Grand Prix, although he scored no championship points.
